website_summaries.verdict: Great starter set or extensive add-on set in a rainbow-themed color palette.
pros: Classic triangles and squares, also pentagons
With 62 pieces total, this kit makes a decent starter set
The shapes are perfect for use by themselves or as add-ons to other sets
Rainbow-themed color palette makes for a beautiful building experience
cons: A pricier set, but most think it is worth it

website_summaries.verdict: These open-tile shapes are easier for small fingers to use than the solid pieces other brands offer.
pros: 62-piece set of open tile blocks in a variety of shapes and colors
cons: Includes some unusual shapes that are difficult to use in building

customer_reviews.title: ... compared to other magnetic building toys but my toddlers love them! I'm going to be forced to get ...
customer_reviews.text: These magformers are quite expensive compared to other magnetic building toys but my toddlers love them! I'm going to be forced to get a bigger set because they're always telling me they don't have enough :) these are the new legos I believe!
customer_reviews.author: Presina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect number of pieces
customer_reviews.text: This set has the perfect number of pieces to make a bunch of creations. Sturdy and durable. Magformers is the only brand I trust for this type of product. Includes convenient handbook full of creations that can be made and instructions on how to make them.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Reinecke

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, we have tons which is so fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these so much. This is the third time he’s asked for them for his bday. He gets so creative with his building, I’m always impressed. We have so many now, and all different shapes which is so fun. Just buy the regular kits, don’t go for any that come with themes like log cabin or vehicles. Just let the kids create with their own imagination
customer_reviews.author: CRamon

customer_reviews.title: Box cover has ferris wheel attachment that is not in box
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this toy. When I gave it to my nieces and nephews to play, the initially liked it. However, there is a Ferris wheel attachment that is on both the box and the how to build it book that isn't in the box. The kids saw the cool looking attachment and wanted to play with it and was disappointed that it wasn't in the package. If its not in the box, it shouldn't be on the picture cover. Sad to see disappointment in their faces. Other then that, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sa Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for kids. My daughter (10) ended up using her imagination more with these than her legos. We had purchased a small set prior to this set and found this to add to her set. It's a great gift and toy to have around, especially if you have multiple kids in your home with older and little ones in the house. They are not a choking hazard at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our almost 3 year old for Christmas and he really likes them. Right now he mainly just stacks them and matches the colors but I am certain that as he gets older he will have as much fun building with them as the adults did! He saw a design in the manual that comes with it and I asked him to bring me the required number of each shape so that we can build it from the picture and he was amazed.
customer_reviews.author: rockstartech

customer_reviews.title: Almost as much of a staple as Duplos
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. A really high quality and creative toy for kids. My 2 and 4 year olds love them. The only gripe is that they have an anomaly due to the way the free spinning internal magnets line up that makes two groups of magnets hard to snap together. It's hard to explain, but will just require some help the first couple of times so the kid doesn't get frustrated. Not enough of a ding to subtract a star though!
customer_reviews.author: K & A

customer_reviews.title: Unable to help
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for a child that was receiving little or nothing for Christmas. He signed in through the Salvation Army and I received the information from them. I understand that he wanted this set for Christmas so I purchased it from you and took it to the Salvation Army so they could give it to the boy. Sorry that is the best I can do for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Toys they keep using in new ways
customer_reviews.text: I’m a daycare and I own all the Magformer sets and keep them in two giant sturdy bins. Kids are amazingly creative with these things! Suitable for children very young and on up in age. These toys are very safe and very durable, although we do not leave them around on the floor. Little kids explore them, big kids create incredible designs, buildings, crowns, animals, airplanes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic toy, excellent quality, our grandchildren ages 2 and 3 loved it! Now we need the Add-on’s!
customer_reviews.author: John F. Wolverton

customer_reviews.title: Most popular toy in my classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a set every year to add to my classroom collection. Everybody's favorite thing to play with.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maccarone

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. We got magnet tiles two years ago and my son wanted different shapes and to be able to lift the structures off of the ground to show me. The magnets are strong. These are well made and sturdy. My one year old does play with these with him and aren’t too small. I like the various sets. We’ve also purchased the dinosaur one.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good for any age
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 kids, ages 1, 3, and 8, and all play with these!
customer_reviews.author: Pike

customer_reviews.title: Pricey!! But worth it, kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool! But pricey for the amount of pieces, even though they are sturdy. I got the 62 piece set and my 5 and 3 year old love them, but they both love to build and are finding them self short for pieces! I think it’s worth buying another set or two so my husband and I can share one, and give them another to share so they can fulfill their little imaginations! Cool toy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have magna tiles, playmags and magformers. They use the magformers the least. The magformers pieces do not easily connect and they do not work with magna tiles or playmags. They are also very expensive in comparison to the others. They are not terrible but I would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great. Kids can get real creative and have lots ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to expensive in my opinion, but my son really wanted it for his birthday, and so he got it and he loves it. The product itself is great. Kids can get real creative and have lots of hands on, STEM stimulation. But, again, way to pricey for a kids toy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana MNM

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!  Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to a friends kids for Christmas and they are still playing with them and have also purchased additional sets for their children. The magnets are still going strong and the kids love building with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. This is a nice sized set. Enjoyed by the kids and the adults in the family
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: While these are standard magnet tiles, the main difference between this and other sets we have is that these magnets are strong. I could make a sIzeable 3D structure and hold it by one piece without the bottom falling off. Ideal for a toddler who likes to pick things up and show them to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna C

customer_reviews.title: Great for All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I have three kids and there are 5,9, and 11. All of my children love these tiles. They have been playing with these tiles for several years and they have withstood moving twice.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great set, wait for a sale
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a lightning deal during Prime Day, and it has been great. Magformers are the de facto magnetic building blocks, and the price reflects that. On a sale, this is a great purchase and will help unleash anyone's creative side.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Toy promotes creativity!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our 4 year old grandson. He was very excited when he opened his gift as he already had a smaller set and knew what fun he would have with this larger set that contained an additional shape. I would recommend Magformers, certainly a creative toy! Also purchased the Magnetic Toy Storage Organizer to go along with the 62 piece set. Plenty of room for additional pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Quilting Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to spark creativity
customer_reviews.text: Great for ages 3 and up. We used this set to add to our current Magformers. All three love using their imagination to build things.
customer_reviews.author: steven kolb

customer_reviews.title: Cool to Create With!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, and on sale they are a steal. Very sturdy and strong magnets. Love how you can make 3-d creations, Like a ball. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Creative fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: So happy we chose quality over cost. These are super fun, well made, for my grandson but we all enjoyed the.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah B

customer_reviews.title: Inventive
customer_reviews.text: The grand kids love playing with these. The magnets work well and the pieces fit well. The really allow inventiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Bigskidude

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 and 5 year old grandchildren. Teaches imagination, dexterity, visual comprehension. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: NMK

customer_reviews.title: Best option, great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: BEST MAGNETS! These don’t fall apart like other options. You can build something and pick it up without it breaking. My boyfriend and I enjoy playing with these just as much as our two year old daughter. They will be played with for many many years by the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I was struggling between these or magnatiles. After much research and friends recommendations I picked magformers. I am happy I did! My 12 year old and 2 year old love these! My husband and I even love playing and building. We will be buying a few more kits to expand our builds :)
customer_reviews.author: alkalinesailor

customer_reviews.title: Great educational and fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson who is four......"love these Nanna!".. He has played and played. Sturdy, colorful and you can wipe them down. Hours of enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Great item for Grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my Grandchildren to play with. As the number of Grandchildren has increased, another set was needed. Very pleased with the imagination play and size of pieces. Works well for even the young ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Michael

customer_reviews.title: Get a bigger set for most play possibilities
customer_reviews.text: We received these as a gift, as well as purchasing our own set, and they were the most played-with item on Christmas morning! All three kids from age 7 down to 20 months were immersed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Em El Ed

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who plays with these enjoys them!
customer_reviews.text: These are a fun open ended toy for all ages. My childrens' aunts and uncles all played with them at a recent family get together. The colors are fun. It is so easy to build and get them to stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice toys, just sad that kids this days are ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice toys, just sad that kids this days are overfilled with toys and they loose interest in everything... My smaller kids likes them.
customer_reviews.author: I.M

customer_reviews.title: Fun, versatile, wide age range
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had kids from 3yo up to 14yo playing with these together. They’re fun and versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Magformers Magic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set of magformers because we didn’t have the pentagon shape and it never hurts to have more magformers. My 5, 3, and 1 year old love the new addition. They’ve been playing non-stop.
customer_reviews.author: Alark

customer_reviews.title: Needed these when I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Easy to use for younger kids and can build many different things.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Knecht

customer_reviews.title: fantastic toy
customer_reviews.text: The set is fantastic. The pieces connect to each other well, and stay connected, too. The magnets are completely enclosed, and rotate freely inside, so it does not matter which side of the shape you use, it will attract anyway, unless you try to connect two stacks. 62 pieces seem to be enough for 1-2 kids. I am pretty sure I will buy more sets in the future.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Entertaing toy, Kids loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for visiting grandchildren girl 5 and boy 7. It kept them busy for several days, even though, unknown to me, they already had some of the at home. They are a nice quality toy with attractive colors and good magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Knick

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We had friends with something similar, but more expensive. Figured I’d try these since they were a little cheaper. They are awesome! My 4 year old son and 6 year old daughter love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate Niznik

customer_reviews.title: Opened Ended Play
customer_reviews.text: Children like them and they are nice for open-ended play.
customer_reviews.author: VAMcKennas

customer_reviews.title: Playing flexibility and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter love to play because they can create something like animal and shapes. Especially, they love play with them on the refrigerator. I do like it and recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these toys. He is 2. We love to build houses and space ships together. Love that there Are different colors and shapes! Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Massey

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These are fun to play with for all ages. Limited capabilities, kids may get bored after few playtimes!
customer_reviews.author: CSK

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: way much better than other brands safe and hold pretty strong highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: yearkong

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tory Mccutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love These
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these things. I just wish they weren't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not flimsy..built well
customer_reviews.text: They are built so well..we love them so much we add to our collection every year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is going to love these for Christmas, he plays with these at his speech therapists office and they are awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I love that both my 3-year-old and 1-year-old can enjoy these in their own way (one by building, the other by rattling and just carrying around). In fact, this is one toy even the adults enjoy playing with!
customer_reviews.author: E.R.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year angel loved it and so are we (parents) in trying our hand on new designs. Materials are in good quality and comes with attractive colours. Our first design was a ball and my kid just threw it in the air. We had our hand in our mouth as it fell down to the floor and to our surprise it has survived. It has been dropped lot more times and so far is has kept along.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I got the larger set for him
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and was told that my nephew plays with it daily. I'm glad I got the larger set for him.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be great quality though
customer_reviews.text: My son got these as a gift from grandma. He LOVES them and is so creative with them and what he builds with them. My only complaint is they are so expensive. They seem to be great quality though!
customer_reviews.author: J.L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My almost 4 year old loves these! He wants to put together every option in the book. They are also great for my one year old to practice holding (under supervision)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: And the magnets are really good.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves these. He can play with them for hours. And the magnets are really good.
customer_reviews.author: peter joseph

customer_reviews.title: MAGNAFORMERS VS MAGNATILES
customer_reviews.text: If you’re on the fence about getting these vs magnatiles... GET THESE! (From a mom who has both) magnatiles are great but sometimes pinch little fingers! My 1 year old & 5 year old love these magformers! FINALLY a toy they enjoy playing TOGETHER!
customer_reviews.author: MamaKorompis

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy for kids if many ages to be creative with if they don’t want to follow along with the included pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnetic Tiles
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves magnetic tiles! She uses them daily to build castles or other creations. Love how this toy lets her imagination flow!
customer_reviews.author: G Robinson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Toy
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 and 2 year old love playing with these! It is a great building toy to inspire creativity. They are very expensive but the build quality seems good, so you seem to get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 4 yr old. The fun never ends. He is constantly making new things. Has played with them everyday since Hanukkah. I will be buying more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these. Watched the video once, glanced at the instruction manual that is included and got to work. They've created the shapes in the book and have made up other creations. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R.

customer_reviews.title: Magformers are a wonderful toy! They have caused our grandsons to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are a wonderful toy! They have caused our grandsons to use their imaginations in ways that are entertaining and inspiring. We hope to add to their sets with more Magformers!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy
customer_reviews.text: We loves these things in out house. My son is 3 and we got him some for Christmas last year, we now have 3 sets. They are well worth the cost and hold their value. Amazing toys
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set - just enough to build some fun things.
customer_reviews.author: kateslp914

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I bought this for my baby girl or hubby. :D Anyway both love playing it! Thanks for sending out the 2nd time fast after we explained the first one had some issues.
customer_reviews.author: Hmone Lian

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as gifts to several children. Parents of the children had requested them.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Terrific imagination building blocks
customer_reviews.text: These are some terrific blocks....my grand children tote them around all day, as there is so many variations that you can make with them. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: First day complicated creations
customer_reviews.text: Gave my grandson this set for his fourth birthday. Here it is one day later and he has created 4 -5 amazing complicated structures (at least that is the number of pictures I saw!) It is a hit. I was advised to buy a smaller set at first but am so glad I got the 62 piece so he could go wild with it. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Kids keep playing
customer_reviews.text: We have several different sets of these. The kids play with them on different times. Doesn't get old.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Monas

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves to build and this was an instant hit. He loves playing with this and has created some neat things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four different sets of Magformers--an investment of more than $200--over the past two years. We keep them out in our living room. It is a great conversation piece. Our vistors are always interested in the concept and enjoy building or watching others construct items from the instructions or from their imaginations. Our 5-year-old grandsaon is particularly good at building with them. He is learning to follow picture instructions and also to make creative objects. So far none of the pieces have broken--although they have been accidentally stepped on occasionally. I am surprised Magformers are not more universally available for sale--but probably the high price discourages people from trying them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Comfort

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandson and for Christmas and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: K Tech

customer_reviews.title: For everyone
customer_reviews.text: Magformers is a great building kit for kids of all ages. I'm a senior and I enjoy playing with it with my grandson.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well built. Strong magnets! 5 yr old grandson loves them! (so do we)!

customer_reviews.title: Best toy for fun and creative play

customer_reviews.text: My autistic 5 year old spends hours building complex structures with these and has yet to damage a single piece. Worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Strong hold, so many possibilities for different builds. Hours of play! Huge hit with 4, 5 & 7 year olds!

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: The boys love these they all want to play with them

customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter can play with these for hours!! she loves the magnets!!

customer_reviews.title: They're great!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old great grandson thinks the Magformers are wonderful! He's having so much fun playing with them.

customer_reviews.title: The game is great but you really need many many pcs for building ...
customer_reviews.text: The game is great but you really need many many pcs for building good things. This one 62 pcs only let you to make balls and small houses . I think it's better to buy one with more pices or two different

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old got this for Christmas -- but all of his older siblings love them too! (He is the youngest of 4). They are fun, versatile, and worth the price tag.

customer_reviews.title: Magformers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these sets. Prompt delivery - no issues. Kids really enjoy Magformers. We have several other sets. Will order more, no doubt.

customer_reviews.text: Nothing has ever kept our 3 yr old daughter busy like this stuff! Hours and hours! It's colorful, well-made, and perfect for creativity. And it cleans up great because all the pieces lump together again.

customer_reviews.title: great for fun & learning!
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are my grandkids new favorites. Although not inexpensive, these are fun and educational. Will be purchasing other sets.

customer_reviews.text: We take these when we travel. My son has had these on airplanes, the beach, the car. Great product. I have a bag we keep them in for on the go.

customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves these. Very durable which is a must, with my boy.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun for my 2yr old and 5 yr old

customer_reviews.title: FUN! Fun! fun!
customer_reviews.text: Used to entertain my grandkids when they visit! But it’s questionable who enjoys building things with them more - the grandkids or myself!

customer_reviews.title: Good learning tool.
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific! It's amazing how fast a 2 year old can learn to really put things together. Great booklet of construction ideas for Grandma. Well made.

customer_reviews.title: They make excellent refrigerator magnets
customer_reviews.text: The adults seem to enjoy these more than my nephew. Bright side, they make excellent refrigerator magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Zinnia

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: My three year old grandchildren played with Magformers at my girlfriends house when we were over there one day. They were crazy about them so of course I ordered some. I have made a few orders for these Magformers and I plan to order more. They are a a little pricey but if you want to get something all the kids will love this is it. They are worth the money. My grandchildren are a set of busy twins and these keep them occupied for a very long time and they are the first thing they pull out to play with. They love it when the adults get involved because then more impressive things get built.
customer_reviews.author: M J

product_meta.title: Magformers Basic Set (62-Pieces) Magnetic Building Blocks, Educational Magnetic Tiles, Magnetic Building STEM Toy, Multi-Colored, Model Number: 63070
product_meta.description: More Shapes, More Models, More Variety, and Definitely More Fun! The 62 piece set is perfect for everyone. A great choice if you're looking for a bigger challenge, and a novice builder will quickly and easily learn to manipulate the simple touch/connect magnets and start building like a pro. With so many colorful pieces you can "Build the ball", build a house, build a building, make a simple cube, a simple pyramid, a cute and colorful snail and our favorite the turtle! This is the basic set and MORE. The 62 Piece set 2x more pieces than the classic set, PLUS we've added an exciting new shape; the Pentagon! The Pentagon will take your building designs to the next level. Your only limit is your imagination.
feature_bullets: Magnet magic: The pieces are designed with Neodymium Rare-Earth Magnets that ensures connectivity every time you play or build.
Perfect for STEM education. Learn shapes, colors and how to build from 2D to 3D!
